means.word_mean: 1. a Bantu language spoken in the Kenyan coastal areas of East Africa

auth_sentence.content: The Pokomo are farmers, while the Orma raise cattle.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Pokomo are farmers, while the Orma raise cattle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Pokomo are farmers, while the Orma raise cattle.

auth_sentence.content: Many Pokomo also have fled to the camps, fearing retaliation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many Pokomo also have fled to the camps, fearing retaliation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many Pokomo also have fled to the camps, fearing retaliation.

auth_sentence.content: Despite these measures, both Pokomo and Orma have been slow to return home.
auth_sentence.res_content: Despite these measures, both Pokomo and Orma have been slow to return home.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Despite these measures, both Pokomo and Orma have been slow to return home.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
